body:
There is a “no turning back” threshold which I find exciting, which it’s the following: 

-0-10% being blackmailed, it’s easy to turn them to the police if you weren’t in a hentai manga

-10-30% taking fotos, the female lead accepts it, and begins the corruption

-30-50% sex favors which don’t involve vaginal intercourse, more to the corruption

50-70% sex in front of others/in public, which don’t necessarily involve vaginal intercourse. Footage may get taken, the heroine begins to question if she wanted it from the start 

70-100% because im lazy. I should’ve used a points system. Well de flotation if she’s a virgin, sex with non-humans, public gangbangs, the degeneracy is usually revealed here in a exhibitionism hentai.


Fuck I was here
